MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick-Upon-Tweed. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:07pm due to a grounded overhead line and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:03pm on the 13th of October 2020.
